title: Cafe Nom De Plume
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Progressive small cafe, with a relaxed vibe; a 10 minute walk to the main train station. Staff understands veganism. The street has a very bar/cafe culture. Has four vegan mains and four vegetarian mains, plus several starters and sides are vegan.
